reviewText: I paired this DVD with a read aloud about earthquakes.  I found a quiz on-line that accompanied Bill Nye's DVD.  My students were filling it out as they viewed this DVD - good accountability! The visual aspect helped them thoroughly understand earthquakes and I was surprised how much they learned during our read aloud.  (4th grade)
I bought this for Ascension Elementary School in gang territory.  The teachers and kids loved it.  Wish we could afford to buy more of their products.
Just what I was looking for
What can I say, it's Bill! He is awesome!
Love Bill Nye! My daughter loves all of his videos so far. He teaches while using humor. My daughter loves Science.
Bill Nye has my students watching every minute of his video explaining earthquakes and everything else that they should know!!  Worth the purchase!!
